abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews American Genius, National Geographic Channel's eight-part history series on American innovators.
lead_paragraph: This eight-part series on the National Geographic Channel begins on Monday with episodes about Steve Jobs and Bill Gates, and the Wright brothers and Glenn Curtiss.

headline.main: Review: ‘American Genius’ Focuses on Rivalries on the Road to Innovations
headline.print_headline: Rivalries on the Road to World-Changing Innovations

snippet: This eight-part series on the National Geographic Channel begins on Monday with episodes about Steve Jobs and Bill Gates, and the Wright brothers and Glenn Curtiss.
